text:
- [Narrator] Data integration
is complex and time consuming.

To author jobs, you must
connect to data sources,

apply transformations,
set up runtime parameters,
and review jobs after that, you will need

to manually troubleshoot
job runs when issues occur.
Amazon Q Data Integration and AWS Glue
simplifies this process by enabling you
to build data integration pipelines faster

using natural language,
describe your intent
through a chat interface.

Amazon Q Data Integration
will generate a complete job.
You can test the job and put it
into production with a single click.

You can troubleshoot
errors without diving deep

into documentation, logs
and reference materials.

Amazon Q Data Integration
provides instant expert guidance
throughout your data integration journey.

You don't need to be an
Apache Spark or SQL expert,

or wait for an expert to
answer your questions.
Build data integration jobs faster,
troubleshoot issues via a chat interface

and get instant data
integration expert help
with Amazon Q Data Integration.

Start integrating data
using natural language
with Amazon Q, today.
